welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Msambweni, Kenya! Known for its stunning beaches and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ukunda Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal is available for VIP and charter flights at Ukunda Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bamburi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bamburi Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all areas of the airport, but connection speeds may vary.
